column3: Obs! Leading '-' should not exist in protocol level
Traffic Light Controller is in local mode. NTS has no control.
Traffic Light Controller is in fail safe mode e.g. yellow flash or dark mode
Traffic Light Controller has a medium priority fault, but not in fail safe mode.

column1: E.g. several lamp faults or detector fault

column3: Traffic Light Controller has a low priority fault. E.g. Detector fault
Traffic Light Controller dark according to configuration.

column1: NOTE! When dark according to configuration the controller is considered to be in use
